definition: surname Yin/abbr. for 印度[Yin4 du4]
to print/to mark/to engrave/a seal/a print/a stamp/a mark/a trace/image
flower/blossom/CL:朵[duo3],支[zhi1],束[shu4],把[ba3],盆[pen2],簇[cu4]/fancy pattern/florid/to spend (money, time)/(coll.) lecherous/lustful

sentences.english: Blue Allover is the most representative daily article and decorating article in the area South of Yangtze River.
sentences.chinese: 蓝印花布是江南最有代表性的生活用品和装饰用品。

sentences.english: HK$5,000 for the stamp duty deposit.
sentences.chinese: 港币五千元之印花税按金。

sentences.english: We shall cover the seat of this old chair with chintz.
sentences.chinese: 我们将用印花布罩住这旧椅子的椅面。

sentences.english: Color transfer printing of T-shirt is one of process of textile printing.
sentences.chinese: 彩绘转印是T恤图案印花工艺中的一种。

sentences.english: The relation between substituting degree of amylum and brei removing rate after printing is also discussed.
sentences.chinese: 对淀粉的取代度与印花后脱糊率的关系进行了探讨。

sentences.english: We are pleased to receive your order of 16th June for cotton prints .
sentences.chinese: 很高兴接到你方6月16日印花棉布的订单。

sentences.english: Instead of picking dainty pastel florals, try a larger print in darker colors.
sentences.chinese: 舍弃碎花，试试深底色上面大一些的印花。

sentences.english: The suggestive sheerness of this shirt is juxtaposed with an androgynous bow tie and a bright printed skirt.
sentences.chinese: 这件透视衬衫搭配中性领结和亮色印花裙，效果很好。

sentences.english: I think the graphic trend is far from being over.
sentences.chinese: 我觉得印花图纹还是流行的焦点呢。

sentences.english: Ad valorem stamp duty is payable by the transferee(s) if this form is completed.
sentences.chinese: 如已填妥本表格，承让人须缴付从价印花税。

sentences.english: This software is applicable for the patterns in European and American fashions.
sentences.chinese: 该软件可用于印刷欧美风格T恤的印花制稿。

sentences.english: The stamp duty and the legal costs will be shared equally between both of you.
sentences.chinese: 至于印花税和律师费将由买卖双方平分。

sentences.english: She'sdressed in a floaty white skirt and a cotton print camisole.
sentences.chinese: 她穿着一条翩翩白裙和印花布紧身衣。

sentences.english: U. S. special dyes in direct printing and special printing processes.
sentences.chinese: 我们的染料专用在直接印花和特种印花工艺中。

sentences.english: U. S. special dyes in direct printing and special printing processes.
sentences.chinese: 我们的染料专用在直接印花和特种印花工艺中。

sentences.english: The decal does not adhere to the window.
sentences.chinese: 这种印花胶纸粘不到窗子上。

definition: Jacquard weave (machine weaving leaving protruding pattern)
crew neck/round neck (of pull-over garment, e.g. T-shirt)

to return to old ways (a Confucian aspiration)/to turn back the clock/neoclassical school during Tang and Song associated with classical writing 古文/retro (fashion style based on nostalgia, esp. for 1960s)
